content.description: fun contrived line, start at the end of dirty rail and go big straight out the roof, can be linked from the start of dirty rail for similar difficulty (v7ish)
content.location: on dirty rail boulder starts past the difficult part of that problem

content.description:
The problem begins with a delicate sequence up the left arete of the boulder on fantastic rock, linking into the rad rail feature in the middle of the face. The moment of truth is a dynamic throw to the right arete, followed by a few easy exit moves.

 Beta video: youtube.com/watch?v=BLKSvtuâ€¦
content.location: Directions can be found in the photos section of this page. In general, the boulder is located about 100 yards uphill from The Dirty Rail in a gully to the north.

content.description: rad looking climb on perfectly sculpted holds
content.location: up one tier from dirty rail, if facing the top out of that climb walk up and right and loop around

content.description: Sit start on the large undercling and climb the rail out of the roof using a combination of heel hooks, toe hooks, and core tension.
content.location: From the Kraft parking lot, go west until you see the old foundation. Look for a trail going south (left) and then eventually west again (right) into the wash up the hill. Keep going up hill in the wash. It'll be on the right hand side. It's further than you think it is.
